name: gShift Labs
tag_list: seo-software, seo, search, search-engine-optimization, social-media-analytics, search-analytics
overview:
SEO Software that helps you optimize an entire web presence and deliver on your Organic Search Strategy through recommendations & reporting.

gShift Labs helps companies get to Page One on search engines. Getting found means getting business. But today that means managing everything about your company on the web in once place so you know what to do next and what the results are. Itâ€™s about web presence optimization.

gShiftâ€™s US patent-pending SEO software is changing the way you deliver on your organic search strategy. According to Forbes Ad Effectiveness Study, SEO is the most effective marketing tactic for generating conversions, outranking Paid Search (PPC) and email marketing.

Businesses today need to look at organic search as a viable channel for lead generation and manage it accordingly. gShiftâ€™s software allows marketers and agencies to do just that.

Organic search is difficult. It is very different than Paid Search or Display Ads. It is complex, with many uncontrollable factors. Search engines change all the time. Your organic search strategy needs to be executed every single day too because your organic ranking changes everyday and so does your competitors.

gShiftâ€™s Web Presence Optimizer makes it easy to understand your current position, your competitorsâ€™ positions and helps you implement change and report on progress. Now that is helpful.

gShift looks beyond your web site too. Our software takes your entire web presence into consideration when helping you manage your organic search strategy. Your blogs, social presence and press releases are so important to your overall ranking, yet so difficult to get control over.
